name: Close Quarters Combat Tactics
description: Mastering hand-to-hand combat techniques and close-range weapons for high-risk encounters.

cards.title: Fundamentals of Close Quarters Combat
cards.description: Building a strong foundation in tactical hand-to-hand engagement.
bulletpoints: Mastering basic strikes, blocks, and counterattacks.
Understanding body mechanics and movement efficiency.
Situational awareness and reaction speed training.
cards.summaryText: Instills core striking chains, efficient movement, and rapid threat recognition for tight spaces.

cards.title: Weaponized Self-Defense and Disarmament
cards.description: Neutralizing armed opponents in high-pressure situations.
bulletpoints: Defensive techniques against knives, batons, and firearms.
Using improvised weapons for survival combat.
cards.summaryText: Covers armed defense responses, improvised weapon use, and leverage tactics to seize control.

cards.title: Grappling and Submission Techniques
cards.description: Mastering takedowns and ground control to neutralize threats.
bulletpoints: Applying joint locks and submission holds for incapacitation.
Understanding leverage and positioning for ground defense.
Escape tactics from chokeholds and grappling situations.
cards.summaryText: Teaches submissions, leverage management, and escape drills to finish or break free on the ground.
